about_the_game:
TOWER WALKER: THE ANCIENT ONES adds 6 new ancient playable races with special and unique racial traits. By buying this DLC you are first and foremost showing your support for Tower Walker and future development but you also get a load of exclusive bonus content.

PLAYABLE RACES

  • Dark Elf
  • Vampire
  • Troll
  • Demon
  • Minotaur
  • Lizard

DARK ELF
The first dark elf sorcerer to join the council of mages was prince Jedraak in the second age of the tower. Jedraak warned the council about the soulhunters of the Abyss. This was before the first magic wars of the tower. The dark elves evolved to thrive on soul magic, they had been in conflict with the demonlords for a thousand years in the deepest part of the Abyss realm.

VAMPIRE
The vampire lord Kanomaoenus from the frozen northlands traded many times with the council of mages in the tower during the second age. There was certain exotic magic items that could only be found in the tower that Kanomaoenus needed for vampiric dark rituals.

TROLL
The chieftain troll Zaguul from the Zulmaris swampland tribes to the west discovered the tower in the second age. The trolls could sense the magic beneath. The order of mages was curious about the potential of troll curses and invited Zaguul to join their order.

DEMON
At the end of the first age the wizards in the tower opened their first magic portal to the Abyss realm. In the abyss they encountered the dark elves, orcs and the demons. The ancient demonlords of the Abyss existed as four different factions at this time.

MINOTAUR
The minotaurs are rare creatures that lives in the forest of Aldera. They worship and devote their lives to the ancient forest god Korganos. They are known for being great warriors on the battlefield. The king of Stormholme once sent envoys to recruit the minotaurs to join his army in the third age. These envoys were lost in the deep forests and was never heard from again.

LIZARD
The lizards from the desert southlands has always feared the tower. In the second age one of their shamans stumbled upon a portal leading into the dark sorcerer Moortus chambers in the upper parts of the tower. When he returned back home to his tribe there was a red glow in his eyes and he had powerful magic. This shaman became known as high king Salasaar of the red scorched tribes.
